message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent investment considering the product's true worth is $12,000 to you. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon.
